meanings.definition: Moving or facing toward the west.
meanings.sent1: The sun sets in the westbound sky.
meanings.sent2: The westbound train departed at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy rode his horse westbound into the sunset.
meanings.sent4: The westbound wind carried the scent of pine trees.
meanings.sent5: The westbound journey led to a beautiful coastline.

meanings.sent1: She drove westbound on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The airplane flew westbound towards the setting sun.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel scampered westbound across the yard.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed westbound through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The hikers trekked westbound through the forest.
